name: Walking Elephant
description:
In this adventure you help an elephant get others out of their problems, and often himself out of his own as well.

The elephant can shoot things, blow them away or towards him, shout, make music, carry objects, jump, and turn if you click on him.

You can achieve three stars in each of the 15 levels, one for completion, one for clicking on action buttons less than a certain amount and one for having the elephant turn less than a certain amount.
